Activity.Description: TODO : Actions Async and Right Click couldn't be tested properly due to issues found during their validation. Tests for ScrollUp and ScrollDown are not working as expected while validating them against the Windows Test App. The movement of the Scroll Bar on the form is not perceptible enough. On checking the code, I found that if 'SmallChange', ...((RangeValuePattern)vp).Current.SmallChange) (Line 2412 in UIAutomationDriver.cs) is changed to 'Maximize', the Scroll Bar moves.

Have used ScriptAction for reading Document Folder Path and validating the count of screenshot files generated. It has also been used to delete the screenshot files after the successful completion of ScreenshotActivity.
The Expand and Collapse operations are working interchangeably. This is probably due to issues in the ExpandCollapsePattern of UIAutomation.

Tests for ScrollUp and ScrollDown are not working as expected while validating them against the Windows Test App. The movement of the Scroll Bar on the form is not perceptible enough. On checking the code, I found that if 'SmallChange', ...((RangeValuePattern)vp).Current.SmallChange) (Line 2412 in UIAutomationDriver.cs) is changed to 'Maximize', the Scroll Bar moves.

The Expand and Collapse operations are working interchangeably. This is probably due to issues in the ExpandCollapsePattern of UIAutomation.
